languages.text:
После тарана Противник получает бафф:
Урон снижается на 10%, Шанс попадания снижается на 15% на 2 хода

traits.locale_text:
После тарана Противник получает бафф:
Урон снижается на 10%, Шанс попадания снижается на 15% на 2 хода

languages.text: After being rammed, the enemy voidship deals −10% less damage and has its hit chance reduced by −15%. Both effects last for 2 rounds.

traits.locale_text: After being rammed, an enemy voidship deals −10% less damage and has hit chance reduced by −15%. Both effects last for 2 rounds.
After being rammed, an enemy voidship deals −10% less damage and has hit chance reduced by −15%. Both effects last for 2 rounds.
After being rammed, the enemy voidship deals −10% less damage and has it's hit chance reduced by −15%. Both effects last for 2 rounds.
After being rammed, the enemy voidship deals −10% less damage and has its hit chance reduced by −15%. Both effects last for 2 rounds.
After being rammed, the enemy voidship deals −10% less damage and has its hit chance reduced by −15%. Both effects last for 2 rounds.

languages.text: Став целью тарана, вражеские пустотные корабли наносят на 10% меньше урона, а шанс их попадания сокращается на 15%. Оба эффекта действуют в течение 2 раундов.
languages.original_text: After being rammed, the enemy voidship deals −10% less damage and has its hit chance reduced by −15%. Both effects last for 2 rounds.

traits.locale_text: Став целью тарана, вражеские пустотные корабли наносят на 10% меньше урона, а шанс их попадания сокращается на 15%. Оба эффекта действуют в течение 2 раундов.
Став целью тарана, вражеские пустотные корабли наносят на 10% меньше урона, а шанс их попадания сокращается на 15%. Оба эффекта действуют в течение 2 раундов.

languages.text: Wurde das feindliche Raumschiff gerammt, verursacht es -10 % Schaden und seine kritische Trefferchance wird um −15 % reduziert. Beide Effekte dauern 2 Runden lang an.
languages.original_text: After being rammed, the enemy voidship deals −10% less damage and has its hit chance reduced by −15%. Both effects last for 2 rounds.

traits.locale_text: Wurde das feindliche Raumschiff gerammt, verursacht es -10 % Schaden und seine kritische Trefferchance wird um -15 % reduziert. Beide Effekte dauern 2 Runden lang an.

languages.text: Après avoir été éperonné, le vaisseau ennemi inflige −10 % de dégâts et voit ses chances de toucher réduites de −15 %. Les effets durent 2 rounds.
languages.original_text: After being rammed, the enemy voidship deals −10% less damage and has its hit chance reduced by −15%. Both effects last for 2 rounds.

traits.locale_text: Après avoir été éperonné, le vaisseau ennemi inflige -10 % de dégâts et voit ses chances d'infliger un coup réduites de -15 %. Les effets durent 2 rounds.
Après avoir été éperonné, le vaisseau ennemi inflige -10 % de dégâts et voit ses chances d'infliger un coup réduites de -15 %. Les effets durent 2 rounds.

languages.text: Tras sufrir una embestida, la nave del vacío enemiga inflige un −10 % menos de daño y su probabilidad de impacto se reduce en un −15 %. Ambos efectos duran 2 asaltos.
languages.original_text: After being rammed, the enemy voidship deals −10% less damage and has its hit chance reduced by −15%. Both effects last for 2 rounds.

traits.locale_text: Tras sufrir una embestida, la nave del vacío enemiga inflige un −10 % menos de daño y su probabilidad de impacto se reduce en un −15 %. Ambos efectos duran 2 asaltos.

languages.text: 突撃された後、敵のヴォイドシップは与えるダメージが-10%減少し、命中確率が-15%減少する。どちらの効果も2ラウンド持続する。
languages.original_text: After being rammed, the enemy voidship deals −10% less damage and has its hit chance reduced by −15%. Both effects last for 2 rounds.

traits.locale_text: 突撃された後、敵のヴォイドシップは与えるダメージが-10%減少し、命中確率が-15%減少する。どちらの効果も2ラウンド持続する。

languages.text: 发动撞角攻击后，敌方虚空舰造成的伤害降低10%，命中率降低15%，两种效果各持续两轮。
languages.original_text: After being rammed, the enemy voidship deals −10% less damage and has its hit chance reduced by −15%. Both effects last for 2 rounds.

traits.locale_text: 发动撞角攻击后，敌方虚空舰造成的伤害降低10%，命中率降低15%，两种效果各持续两轮。

languages.text: Düşman uçsuz gemisi, koçbaşı vuruşuna maruz kaldıktan sonra %10 daha az hasar verir ve vuruş olasılığı %15 azalır. İki etki de 2 raunt sürer.
languages.original_text: After being rammed, the enemy voidship deals −10% less damage and has its hit chance reduced by −15%. Both effects last for 2 rounds.
